meanings.sent1: The children were mesmerized by the enchanting storybook.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with enchanting flowers of all colors.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's enchanting antics kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her enchanting smile lit up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting melody of the music brought tears to their eyes.

meanings.definition: To cast a spell over someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The magician enchanted the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: The witch enchanted the potion to make it irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The spell accidentally enchanted the broom to dance on its own.
meanings.sent4: The enchanting words of the sorcerer echoed through the chamber.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting spell transformed the frog into a prince before their eyes.
